targets.query:
latestRecord = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: 2015-01-01T00:00:00Z, stop: 2100-01-01T00:00:00Z)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "validator_staked")
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

latestTime = latestRecord._time

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: latestTime)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["status"] == "active")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "validator_staked" or r["_field"] == "delegators_staked")
  |> group()
  |> sum(column: "_value")

latestRecord = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: 2015-01-01T00:00:00Z, stop: 2100-01-01T00:00:00Z)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "validator_staked")
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

latestTime = latestRecord._time

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: latestTime)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["status"] == "active")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "validator_staked" or r["_field"] == "delegators_staked")
  |> group()
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value: float(v: r._value) * float(v: ${vet_price})}))

latestRecord = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: 2015-01-01T00:00:00Z, stop: 2100-01-01T00:00:00Z)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "validator_staked")
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

latestTime = latestRecord._time

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: latestTime)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "hayabusa_gas")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "vtho_issued")
  |> drop(columns: ["chain_tag"])

latestRecord = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: 2015-01-01T00:00:00Z, stop: 2100-01-01T00:00:00Z)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "validator_staked")
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

latestTime = latestRecord._time

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: latestTime)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "hayabusa_gas")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "vtho_issued")
  |> drop(columns: ["chain_tag"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: float(v: r._value) * float(v: "${vtho_price}")}))

latestRecord = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: 2015-01-01T00:00:00Z, stop: 2100-01-01T00:00:00Z)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "validator_staked")
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

latestTime = latestRecord._time


issuance = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: latestTime)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "hayabusa_gas")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "vtho_issued")
  |> drop(columns: ["chain_tag"])
  |> group(columns: ["id"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value) * float(v: 360) * float(v: 24) * float(v: 365.25)})) // convert to VTHO per year
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value) * float(v: "${vtho_price}")})) // convert VTHO to USD
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: latestTime)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["status"] == "active")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "validator_staked" or r["_field"] == "delegators_staked")
  |> group(columns: ["label"])
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value) * float(v: "${vet_price}"), _time: latestTime})) // convert VET to USD
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: issuance._value) * float(v: 100) / float(v: r._value)})) // convert total stake to yield

latestRecord = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: 2015-01-01T00:00:00Z, stop: 2100-01-01T00:00:00Z)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "validator_staked")
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

latestTime = latestRecord._time

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: latestTime)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["status"] == "active")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "validator_staked")
  |> group()
  |> sum(column: "_value")

latestRecord = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: 2015-01-01T00:00:00Z, stop: 2100-01-01T00:00:00Z)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "validator_staked")
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

latestTime = latestRecord._time

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: latestTime)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["status"] == "active")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "validator_staked")
  |> group()
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value: float(v: r._value) * float(v: ${vet_price})}))

latestRecord = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: 2015-01-01T00:00:00Z, stop: 2100-01-01T00:00:00Z)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "validator_staked")
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

latestTime = latestRecord._time

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: latestTime)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["status"] == "active")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "delegators_staked")
  |> group()
  |> sum(column: "_value")

latestRecord = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: 2015-01-01T00:00:00Z, stop: 2100-01-01T00:00:00Z)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "validator_staked")
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

latestTime = latestRecord._time

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: latestTime)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["status"] == "active")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "delegators_staked")
  |> group()
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value: float(v: r._value) * float(v: ${vet_price})}))

latestRecord = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: 2015-01-01T00:00:00Z, stop: 2100-01-01T00:00:00Z)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "validator_staked")
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

latestTime = latestRecord._time

issuance = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: latestTime)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "hayabusa_gas")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "vtho_issued")
  |> drop(columns: ["chain_tag"])
  |> group(columns: ["id"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value) * float(v: "${vtho_price}")})) // convert VTHO to USD
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)


blocks_per_year = float(v: 360 * 24) * float(v: 365.25)

weight_sum = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: latestTime)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["status"] == "active")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total_weight")
  |> group()
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: latestTime)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators" and r["status"] == "active")
  |> pivot(
      rowKey:["_time", "validator"],
      columnKey: ["_field"],
      valueColumn: "_value"
  )
  |> group()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with 
//TODO: this is a bit a hack. Grafana thinks the hex is a very big integer and display is wrong. also, the data link doesn't work unless we have this
      "Validator": "=" + r.validator,
      "Completed Periods": r.completed_periods,
      "Online": r.online,
      "total_weight": r.total_weight,
      "Block Probability": float(v: r.total_weight) * 100.0 / float(v: weight_sum._value),
      "Blocks Per Epoch": float(v: r.total_weight) * 180.0 / float(v: weight_sum._value),
      "Start Block": r.start_block,
      "Validator TVL": float(v: r.validator_staked) * float(v: "${vet_price}"),
      "Delegator TVL": float(v: r.delegators_staked) * float(v: "${vet_price}"),
      "Staking Period Length": r.staking_period_length,
      "Exit Signalled": r.signalled_exit,
      "Total Weight": r.total_weight
    }))
  |> keep(columns: [
      "Validator",
      "Completed Periods",
      "Online",
      "Start Block",
      "Staked Amount",
      "Validator TVL",
      "Delegator TVL",      
      "Staking Period Length",
      "Exit Signalled",
      "Block Probability",
      "Blocks Per Epoch",
      "Total Weight"
  ])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with 
      "Blocks Per Year": blocks_per_year * r["Block Probability"] / float(v:100),
      "Has Delegations": r["Delegator TVL"] != float(v: 0)
    }))
  |> sort(columns: ["Blocks Per Epoch"], desc: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with 
      "Total TVL": r["Delegator TVL"] + r["Validator TVL"],
      "Validator Yield": 
        if r["Has Delegations"] then ((r["Blocks Per Year"] * issuance._value / r["Validator TVL"] * float(v: 0.3))) * float(v: 100)
        else (r["Blocks Per Year"] * issuance._value / r["Validator TVL"] * float(v: 100)),
      "Avg Delegator Yield": 
        if r["Has Delegations"] then ((r["Blocks Per Year"] * issuance._value / r["Delegator TVL"] * float(v: 0.7))) * float(v: 100)
        else float(v: 0)
    }))
  |> sort(columns: ["Blocks Per Epoch"], desc: true)

latestRecord = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: 2015-01-01T00:00:00Z, stop: 2100-01-01T00:00:00Z)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "validator_staked")
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

latestTime = latestRecord._time

weight_sum = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: latestTime)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["status"] == "active")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total_weight")
  |> group()
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: latestTime)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators" and r["status"] == "active" and r["signalled_exit"] == "true")
  |> pivot(
      rowKey:["_time", "validator"],
      columnKey: ["_field"],
      valueColumn: "_value"
  )
  |> group()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with 
//TODO: this is a bit a hack. Grafana thinks the hex is a very big integer and display is wrong. also, the data link doesn't work unless we have this
      "Validator": "=" + r.validator,
      "Completed Periods": r.completed_periods,
      "Online": r.online,
      "total_weight": r.total_weight,
      "Block Probability": float(v: r.total_weight) * 100.0 / float(v: weight_sum._value),
      "Blocks Per Epoch": float(v: r.total_weight) * 180.0 / float(v: weight_sum._value),
      "Start Block": r.start_block,
      "Validator TVL": float(v: r.validator_staked) * float(v: "${vet_price}"),
      "Delegator TVL": float(v: r.delegators_staked) * float(v: "${vet_price}"),
      "Staking Period Length": r.staking_period_length,
      "Exit Signalled": r.signalled_exit,
      "Exit Block": r.exit_block
    }))
  |> keep(columns: [
      "Validator",
      "Online",
      "Staked Amount",
      "Block Probability",
      "Blocks Per Epoch",
      "Exit Block",
  ])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with 
      "Total TVL": r["Delegator TVL"] + r["Validator TVL"]
    }))
  |> sort(columns: ["Exit Block"], desc: true)

panels.description: The column `Evicting Block` does not indicate when they will exit. It is the block at which 1 week has passed with an offline status and the protocol will find the next available exit block

targets.query:
latestRecord = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: 2015-01-01T00:00:00Z, stop: 2100-01-01T00:00:00Z)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "validator_staked")
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

latestTime = latestRecord._time

weight_sum = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: latestTime)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["status"] == "active")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total_weight")
  |> group()
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: latestTime)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators" and r["status"] == "active" and r["_field"] == "offline_block")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with forced_exit_block: r._value + uint(v: 336 * 180), offline_block: r._value, validator: string(v: "=" + r.validator)}))
  |> keep(columns: ["forced_exit_block", "offline_block", "signalled_exit", "status", "validator" ])
  |> group()
  |> sort(columns: ["forced_exit_block"], desc: false)

panels.title: Offline Validators

targets.query:
latestRecord = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: 2015-01-01T00:00:00Z, stop: 2100-01-01T00:00:00Z)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total_weight")
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

queued_stakers = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: latestRecord._time)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators" and r["status"] == "queued" and r["_field"] == "queue_position")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "validator"])
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "queue_position"})

validation_stakes = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: -5y)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r["_measurement"] == "validation_queued" and 
    r["_field"] == "stake"
  )
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "validator", "_value"])
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "stake"})

join(
  tables: {queued: queued_stakers, stakes: validation_stakes},
  on: ["validator"]
)
    |> group()
    |> sort(columns: ["queue_position"])
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with stake_usd: float(v: r.stake) * float(v: ${vet_price})}))

latestRecord = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: 2015-01-01T00:00:00Z, stop: 2100-01-01T00:00:00Z)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "validator_staked")
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

latestTime = latestRecord._time

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: latestTime)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "validator_overview" and r["_field"] == "active_validators")

panels.description:
Validators ordered by weight, ie. block production.

The cumulative sum shows what percent the given validator and all above it control.

Eg. Scroll down to look for 67% and see the number of validators to the left

targets.query:
latestRecord = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: 2015-01-01T00:00:00Z, stop: 2100-01-01T00:00:00Z)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "validator_staked")
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

latestTime = latestRecord._time

weight_sum = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: latestTime)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["status"] == "active")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total_weight")
  |> group()
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: latestTime)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators" and r["status"] == "active")
  |> pivot(
      rowKey:["_time", "validator"],
      columnKey: ["_field"],
      valueColumn: "_value"
  )
  |> group()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with 
//TODO: this is a bit a hack. Grafana thinks the hex is a very big integer and display is wrong. also, the data link doesn't work unless we have this
      "Validator": "=" + r.validator,
      "total_weight": r.total_weight,
      "Block Probability": float(v: r.total_weight) * 100.0 / float(v: weight_sum._value),
      "Blocks Per Epoch": float(v: r.total_weight) * 180.0 / float(v: weight_sum._value),
    }))
  |> keep(columns: [
      "Validator",
      "total_weight",
      "Block Probability",
      "Blocks Per Epoch",
  ])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with 
      "Total TVL": r["Delegator TVL"] + r["Validator TVL"]
    }))
  |> sort(columns: ["Blocks Per Epoch"], desc: true)

panels.title: Block Production Dominance

targets.query:
latestRecord = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: 2015-01-01T00:00:00Z, stop: 2100-01-01T00:00:00Z)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "validator_staked")
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

latestTime = latestRecord._time

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: latestTime)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "validator_overview")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "block_in_epoch")
  |> group()
  |> last()

latestRecord = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: 2015-01-01T00:00:00Z, stop: 2100-01-01T00:00:00Z)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "validator_staked")
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

latestTime = latestRecord._time

total_weight = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: latestTime)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "validator_overview")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "active_weight")
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

epoch = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: latestTime)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "validator_overview")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "epoch")
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: -120m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "validator_overview")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "epoch" or r["_field"] == "weight_processed")
  |> pivot(
      rowKey:["_time"],
      columnKey: ["_field"],
      valueColumn: "_value"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["epoch"] == epoch._value)
  |> group(columns: ["signer"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r.weight_processed}))
  |> first()
  |> group()
  |> sum()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * uint(v: 100) / total_weight._value}))

latestRecord = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: 2015-01-01T00:00:00Z, stop: 2100-01-01T00:00:00Z)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "validator_staked")
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

latestTime = latestRecord._time

epoch = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: latestTime)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "validator_overview")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "epoch")
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: -120m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "validator_overview")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "epoch" or r["_field"] == "weight_processed")
  |> pivot(
      rowKey:["_time"],
      columnKey: ["_field"],
      valueColumn: "_value"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["epoch"] == epoch._value)
  |> group(columns: ["signer"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r.weight_processed}))
  |> first()
  |> group()
  |> count()

latestRecord = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: 2015-01-01T00:00:00Z, stop: 2100-01-01T00:00:00Z)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "validator_staked")
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

latestTime = latestRecord._time

total_weight = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: latestTime)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "validator_overview")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "active_weight")
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

epoch = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: latestTime)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "validator_overview")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "epoch")
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: -120m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "validator_overview")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "epoch" or r["_field"] == "weight_processed")
  |> pivot(
      rowKey:["_time"],
      columnKey: ["_field"],
      valueColumn: "_value"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["epoch"] == epoch._value - uint(v: 1))
  |> group(columns: ["signer"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r.weight_processed}))
  |> first()
  |> group()
  |> sum()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * uint(v: 100) / total_weight._value}))

  |> range(start: 2015-01-01T00:00:00Z, stop: 2100-01-01T00:00:00Z)

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "validator_staked")
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)
